title: Record of Schools
description: This document records the details of an school

CountyEntityID.description: The unique identifier for the county

LEAEntityID.description: The unique identifier for the LEA

SchoolEntityID.description: The unique identifier for the school

LEACTDS.description: Nine (9) digit number that the Arizona Department of Education uses to identify Arizona public LEAs

SchoolCTDS.description: Nine (9) digit number that the Arizona Department of Education uses to identify Arizona public schools and charter schools

NCESDID.description: The National Center for Education Statistics (NCES) unique identifier for the LEA

NCESSID.description: The National Center for Education Statistics (NCES) unique identifier for the school

AltName.description: The alternative name of the school

CharterSchool.description: The charter status of the school

AlternativeSchool.description: The alternative status of the school

GradeLevels.description: The grade levels of the school

SchoolZip.description: The zip code of the school

SchoolZip4.description: The zip code extension of the school

Phone.description: The phone number of the school

Status.description: The status of the school Open/Closed
